Experience

2020-2022

Principal Product Designer

Conviva
Foster City CA

Cross-functional product leader driving design, implementation, and adoption of design system and UI platform for Conviva's streaming video data analytics applications. Coordinated between Product, Design, and Engineering teams to deliver consistent UX to users and efficacious DX to developers and designers.

2018-2020
Platform Product Manager
Ascend.IO
Palo Alto CA

Lead product manager for the core technology platform at Ascend, a cloud-based, low-code data engineering platform. Transitioned from frontend engineering into a Product and Design role, in preparation for the company's first product launch.

2015-2018
Director, Design
Orbital Insight
Palo Alto / Mountain View CA

Owned all aspects of UI design and development for Orbital's geospatial analytics platform; including user research, UI/UX design, data visualization, frontend architecture, design system, and UI component library.

2013-2015
Senior Design Engineer
VMware / End-User Computing
Palo Alto CA

Interaction designer and developer for Workspace One, a desktop and mobile enterprise SaaS application.

2013
Senior Design Engineer
Apple / on Contract
Sunnyvale CA

Palo Alto CA

Dual-role designer and frontend developer for early-stage startup in big data visualization space.

Ning / Glam Media
Palo Alto / Brisbane CA

Key player in Product UX and Design organizations, instrumental in the design and prototyping of innovative web applications for desktop, mobile and tablet.
